title: 这神马情况，妄高人解决
author: yutxxxx
txt_content:
15:01:09 [严重] org.apache.commons.lang.UnhandledException: Plugin Essentials v2.12.2 generated an exception while e
ting task 51
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_6_R3.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:56)

Caused by: while scanning a quoted scalar

found unexpected end of stream

一开服就会这样
